typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Dates as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss',
		Category as string,
		Descript as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Resolution as string,
		Address as string,
		X as double,
		Y as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Origen
Origen aggregate(groupBy(PdDistrict),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AgrupadoZonas
AgrupadoZonas sink(input(
		Id as string,
		Dates as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Address as string,
		X as string,
		Y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['salidaZonaAgrupada.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Salida
